content: 4 rs sl1 k3 4 row 5 ws sl1 kfb kfb k1 turn 6 row 6 rs sl1 k5 turn 6 row 7 ws sl1 k2 untwisted m1 k3 turn 7 row 8 rs sl1 k1 k2tog k3 turn 6 row 9 ws sl1 k2 untwisted m1 k1 untwisted m1 k2 turn 8 repeat there are 8 sts on the needle now starting 4 row repeat row 1 rs sl1 k1 yo *k2tog yo* repeat from * to * until 2 sts left on the needle k2 turn row 2 ws sl1 k1 kfb knit until 3 sts left on the needle kfb k2 turn row 3 rs sl1 k1 repeat k2tog until 3 sts left on the needle k3 turn row 4 ws sl1 k1 *k1 untwisted m1* repeat from * to * until 2 sts left on the needle k2 turn repeat these 4 row as many times as needed to achieve a desired size for a scarf make sure to complete full 4 row repeat before binding off finishing bind off using icelandic bind off technique you might want to up your needle size for this bind off to make it less tight weave in all ends and block simona taraškevičiūtė © copyright 2023 instagram @lowkey bold knit this pattern is for private use only it may not be copied sold or otherwise distributed share your lowkey bandana on instagram with the hashtag #lowkeybandana #lowkeyboldknit happy making 3
